article_title: How Data Helped One Medical Practice Cut Hospital Readmissions

article_metadata.author: Zina Moukheiber

og.description: A year ago, doctors at a large practice in Amarillo, Texas, decided to embark on an Obamacare experiment. They set up an accountable care organization that rewarded them for keeping their Medicare patients healthy and out the hospital, instead of billing for each and every service. Any savings from its [...]
